Package org.dotplot.util

Classes for file handling.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ExecutionUnit  
IRegistry<R> Interface for registrys.
 

Class Summary
DirectoryJarClassLoader Instances of this class provide on the fly class loading mechanisms for classes storred in jarfiles in a given directory.
DOMTreeIterator Instances of this class provide iteratorfunctionality for DOM-Trees.
FileCopy Copies files.
FileUtil Provides several static methods for file handling, like im-/export or display of Dialogs.
JarFileClassLoader  
MailUtil  
MailUtil.SMTPAuthenticator SimpleAuthenticator is used to do simple authentication when the SMTP server requires it.
Registry<C>  
 

Exception Summary
